fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Black Tassel__
3 star statstick that allows her to maximize her HP.

__Favonius Lance__
May aid the team with energy management.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Rightful Reward__
Craftable option that outperforms most options, but *only at C6*

__Other HP or Energy Recharge Polearms__
Options like Staff of Homa or Engulfing Lightning exist, but are recommended instead for her offensive teammates.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> HP%|<circlet> HP% or Healing Bonus

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire
**2)** Elemental Burst: Ring of Bursting Grenades
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Line Bayonet Thrust EX

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Tenacity of the Millelith__ is also a great option if teammates have snapshotting abilities like Fischl's Oz.
__Song of Days Past__ isn't recommended as much until C6, and even less if you are not farming for Navia at the same time.
